name: Cleaning The World With Pampam
description:
Help Pampam, a cute and fluffy panda, eliminate the incorrectly disposed garbage to save nature in this educative infinite runner game! Fight a boss and use power ups in this super different educational game.

  • An actually fun educative game!
  • Two game modes!
  • Super cute pixel art!
  • Casual and relaxing!
  • Play as an hyper cute and charismatic panda: Pampam!
  • Use a variety of power-ups!
  • Utilize powers, such as the Rainbow Wave or the Rainbow Tsunami!
  • Fight a giant boss!
  • Buy and wear a diversity of cute hats!
